howToOrderPage.title: How to Order a Service on Hiwwer
howToOrderPage.subtitle: A simple process for ordering digital services for your business and projects

steps.step1_desc: Choose from a wide range of digital services from professionals in their field.
steps.step2_desc: Communicate with the performer to clarify all requirements and expectations.
steps.step3_desc: Pay for the service securely. The money is held in escrow until you accept the work.
steps.step4_desc: Review the completed work, request revisions if necessary, and confirm completion.

findTab.title: How to Find a Suitable Service
findTab.step1_desc: Use keyword search and filter by category, price, and rating to find services that meet your needs.
findTab.step2_desc: Check the performer's profile to see their rating, reviews, and portfolio. This will help you choose the best specialist for your project.
findTab.step3_desc: Most performers offer different service packages with different terms and prices. Choose the one that best suits your requirements and budget.

discussTab.title: How to Discuss Details with the Performer
discussTab.step1_desc: Describe your project in as much detail as possible. Specify the goals, requirements, limitations, and expected results. The more information you provide, the more accurately the performer will understand your needs.
discussTab.step2_desc: Agree with the performer on the exact deadlines, number of revisions, format of the results, and other important terms of cooperation.
discussTab.step3_desc: Provide the performer with all the materials and access needed for the work. This may include texts, images, logins to services, etc.

paymentTab.title: How to Securely Pay for an Order
paymentTab.step1_desc: After discussing the details, place an official order through the platform. Make sure all conditions are correctly reflected in the order.
paymentTab.step2_desc: The Hiwwer platform uses a secure escrow system. Your payment is held in escrow until you confirm satisfactory completion of the work. This protects both the client and the performer.
paymentTab.step3_desc: You can use credit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment methods. All transactions are encrypted and protected.

deliveryTab.title: How to Receive and Accept the Result
deliveryTab.step1_desc: Carefully review the received work. Make sure it meets all the requirements and expectations you discussed with the performer.
deliveryTab.step2_desc: If you need changes, use the 'Request Revisions' feature in the system. Clearly state what needs to be changed, and the performer will make the necessary adjustments.
deliveryTab.step3_title: Accept the Work and Leave a Review
deliveryTab.step3_desc: When you are completely satisfied with the result, confirm acceptance of the work in the system. After that, the funds will be transferred to the performer. Don't forget to leave a review about the performer and their work.

benefits.securePayments_desc: The secure escrow system ensures that you only pay for satisfactorily completed work.
benefits.verifiedPerformers_desc: All performers on the platform are verified, and the rating system helps you choose the best ones.
benefits.telegramIntegration_desc: Receive order status updates and communicate with performers directly in Telegram.

faq.q1: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
faq.a1: If you are not satisfied with the received work, you can request revisions. Most performers offer several free revisions as part of the order. If the work still does not meet your requirements after revisions, you can open a dispute in the support system.
faq.a2: Yes, you can cancel an order before the performer starts working. If the performer has already started working, the cancellation and refund terms depend on the specific performer and the order conditions. Always read the cancellation policy before placing an order.
faq.q3: How long are the order files stored?
faq.a3: Order files and materials are stored on the platform for 3 months after the order is completed. We recommend downloading all materials immediately after accepting the work.
faq.q4: Will I receive a license to use the ordered work?
faq.a4: By default, all rights for commercial use are transferred to the customer upon acceptance of the work and full payment. However, the specific licensing terms may vary depending on the type of service and the performer's conditions. Be sure to discuss this with the performer before ordering.
faq.q5: How does payment for additional services work?
faq.a5: If additional services or an expansion of the scope of work are needed during the order, the performer can offer additional services through the system. You can accept or decline these offers. If accepted, the additional amount will be added to your order.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How much does it cost to register as a performer?
faq.a1: Registering as a performer on Hiwwer is absolutely free. A commission is only charged for successfully completed orders.
faq.a2: Hiwwer charges a 15% commission on the amount of each successfully completed order. This commission covers payment processing, marketing support, and platform development.
faq.q3: When do I get paid for completed orders?
faq.a3: Payment is credited to your account within 24 hours after the client confirms the work's acceptance. You can withdraw funds at any convenient time.
faq.q4: What are the requirements for performers?
faq.a4: The main requirements are confirmed professional skills, a portfolio or work examples, a clear understanding of the platform's rules, and a commitment to providing quality services to clients.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of successful performers on Hiwwer and grow your business

performerGuidelinesPage.title: Performer Guidelines
performerGuidelinesPage.subtitle: Follow these rules and recommendations for successful work on the Hiwwer platform

general.title: General Platform Rules
general.followRules_desc: As a performer on Hiwwer, you are required to follow all platform rules and terms of use. Violating these rules may lead to a temporary or permanent block of your account.
mainRules_items: Only provide services that you can truly deliver with high quality
Do not post content that infringes on copyright or contains plagiarism
Do not encourage clients to communicate outside the platform to avoid commission
Provide truthful information about your experience and skills
general.forbidden_desc: There are certain types of services and actions that are prohibited on the Hiwwer platform. Providing such services or performing such actions will lead to the immediate blocking of your account.
general.forbidden_items_title: It is forbidden to offer services related to:
forbidden_items: Illegal activities or violation of laws
Adult content or sexually explicit materials
general.violations_desc: Hiwwer uses a system of warnings and sanctions for performers who violate the platform's rules. The severity of the consequences depends on the type and number of violations.

violations.first_desc: Warning and information about the violated rule
violations.second_desc: Temporary restriction of service visibility in search (7-14 days)
violations.third_desc: Temporary suspension of the ability to accept new orders (30 days)

quality.title: Service Quality Requirements
quality.standards_desc: Hiwwer strives to ensure high quality of services for all clients. As a performer, you must adhere to the following quality standards:

standards.professionalism_desc: Provide services at a professional level, in accordance with industry standards and best practices.
standards.accuracy_desc: The result must accurately match the described requirements and client expectations.
standards.uniqueness_desc: All work results must be original and not infringe on the copyrights of third parties.
standards.completeness_desc: Ensure the full completion of all aspects of the order, without omissions or shortcomings.

quality.description_desc: A clear and truthful description of services is critically important for successful work on the platform:
recommended_items: - Detailed description of what is included in the service
- Specification of the number of revisions included in the base price
- Samples of previous work to demonstrate quality
- Description of the work process and stages of completion
forbidden_items: - Promising results that you cannot guarantee
- Hiding important limitations or additional costs
- Using someone else's work as examples of your services
- Copying service descriptions from other performers
quality.rating_desc: Your rating and reviews are important factors that affect your visibility and success on the platform:
howToImproveRating_items: - Ask for reviews after successful completion

communication.title: Communication Rules with Clients
communication.principles_desc: Effective and professional communication is the foundation of successful collaboration with clients:
required_items: Clearly explain all details and expectations
Inform the client about the progress of the work
Notify about potential delays in advance
forbidden_items: Exchanging contact information for communication outside the platform
Rudeness, disrespect, or use of offensive language
Threats or pressure on the client
Advertising services not related to the specific order
communication.expectations_desc: Proper management of client expectations is key to successfully completing orders:
recommendations_items: At the beginning of the order, clearly discuss all details and requirements
Define specific criteria for successful order completion
Discuss the number of revisions and the procedure for requesting them
Set realistic deadlines with a small buffer for unforeseen situations
Report on work progress and potential difficulties
communication.conflict_desc: Sometimes misunderstandings or conflicts with clients may arise. Here's how to resolve them correctly:
conflict_steps: Stay calm and professional - regardless of the situation, remain polite and professional.
Listen carefully to the client's complaint - understand the essence of the problem before responding.
Offer a specific solution - focus on how you can solve the problem.
Keep your promises - if you agreed to certain revisions or compensation, do it in a timely manner.
If necessary, contact support - if the conflict cannot be resolved, contact the platform moderators.

payments.title: Payments, Fees, and Withdrawals
payments.system_desc: Understanding the payment system and fees is important for successful work on the platform:
howItWorks_steps: The client makes a payment - the funds are held in the platform's escrow.
You complete the order - the funds remain in escrow until the client reviews it.
The client accepts the work - the funds (minus the platform's commission) are transferred to your balance.
You can withdraw the funds - using the available withdrawal methods.
payments.fees_desc: Hiwwer charges a commission for each successfully completed order. This commission covers payment processing, marketing, client acquisition, and platform support.
payments.fee_note: * The commission is calculated from the total order amount
payments.withdrawal_desc: After successfully completing orders, you can withdraw your earned funds to your bank account or other payment systems:
withdrawalTerms_items: - Number of free withdrawals per month: 1

faq.q1: What happens if a client cancels an order?
faq.a1: If a client cancels an order before you start working, you will not be paid. If you have already started working, payment is calculated based on progress: 50% payment if more than half of the work is done, or full payment if the work is almost complete (at the moderator's discretion in disputed cases).
faq.q2: How can I offer additional services to a client?
faq.a2: You can offer additional services through the 'Additional Options' system on the order page. The client will receive a notification with your offer and can accept or decline it. If the client accepts, the cost of the additional services will be added to the total order amount.
faq.q3: What if I need more time to complete an order?
faq.a3: If you need to extend the deadline, you should inform the client as soon as possible through the messaging system. Propose a new completion date and explain the reasons for the delay. The client can accept or decline your request. Important: regular delays can negatively affect your rating and visibility in search results.
faq.q4: Can I offer discounts to regular clients?
faq.a4: Yes, you can offer discounts to regular clients through the coupon system. In your performer dashboard, there is a 'Discounts and Promo Codes' section where you can create personal coupons for individual clients or general promo codes for certain categories of clients. Discounts are applied to the order value, but the platform commission is calculated from the original service price.
faq.q5: How can I dispute an unfair review?
faq.a5: If you believe you have received an unfair review, you can dispute it through the support system. To do this, go to the review page and click 'Dispute Review'. You will need to provide a detailed explanation and evidence to support your position. Moderators will review your complaint and make a decision within 5 business days. Please note that only reviews that violate the platform's rules or contain inaccurate information can be disputed.
